about_the_game:
The GRID is an immersive, action-packed cyberpunk shooter that drops you into the heart of a dystopian city where danger lurks in every shadow. As a lone vigilante, you'll navigate the neon-lit streets of "The Grid," battling cybernetic enemies and uncovering a sinister conspiracy that threatens the very fabric of reality.

Key Features

  • Immersive VR Experience: Feel every gunshot, explosion, and pulse of the city as you dive deep into a fully interactive cyberpunk world.

  • Intense Action: Use weapons and augmented abilities to outsmart and outgun relentless enemies.

  • Dynamic Combat: Experience fluid, fast-paced combat mechanics that reward precision and strategy.

  • Cinematic Visuals: The game’s art style and atmosphere create a immersive and visually stunning experience, designed for fans of superhero-style action.
    Are you ready to take on the city’s deadliest threats and become a legend in the shadows? GRID is your ticket to a world of high-stakes cyberpunk chaos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-12400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: PCVR
  • Additional Notes: This game requires a VR headset in order to play. See system requirements for details.

short_description: Enter The Grid—where the line between hunter and hunted blurs. Survive the neon-soaked streets, outsmart relentless enemies, and bring order to chaos. Are you ready to pull the trigger on a digital nightmare? The city won’t save itself."
